languages.text: Великолепное оружие, изготовленная некогда для первого Вольного Торговца династии Винтерскейл. По причине небольшой рукояти, явно сделанной под женскую руку, оружие стало источником множества романтичных легенд о том, кому в подарок предназначалась сия вещь.

A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.
languages.original_text: Великолепное оружие, изготовленная некогда для первого Вольного Торговца династии Винтерскейл. По причине небольшой рукояти, явно сделанной под женскую руку, оружие стало источником множества романтичных легенд о том, кому в подарок предназначалась сия вещь.

traits.locale_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

languages.text: 这把华丽的武器，是温特斯凯尔家族的首位行商浪人下令制作的。它的枪柄较小，显然是专门为女性手部设计。至于这件礼物究竟送给了谁，这个谜团引发了无数浪漫的传说。
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

traits.locale_text: 这把华丽的武器，是温特斯凯尔家族的首位行商浪人下令制作的。它的枪柄较小，显然是专门为女性手部设计。至于这件礼物究竟送给了谁，这个谜团引发了无数浪漫的传说。

languages.text: かつてウィンタースケイル家の初代ローグトレーダーの依頼で作られた上質な武器。明らかに女性用にデザインされた小さな柄のため、贈った相手の正体について数多くのロマンチックな伝説を生んだ。
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

traits.locale_text: かつてウィンタースケイル家の初代ローグトレーダーの依頼で作られた上質な武器。明らかに女性用にデザインされた小さな柄のため、贈った相手の正体について数多くのロマンチックな伝説を生んだ。

languages.text: Una gloriosa arma creada por orden del primer Comerciante Independiente de la casa Winterscale. Dado que su empuñadura es pequeña y fue diseñada para la mano de una mujer, esta pieza ha dado lugar a numerosas leyendas románticas sobre su presunta destinataria.
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

traits.locale_text: Una gloriosa arma creada por orden del primer Comerciante Independiente de la casa Winterscale. Dado que su empuñadura es pequeña y fue diseñada para la mano de una mujer, esta pieza ha dado lugar a numerosas leyendas románticas sobre su presunta destinataria».

languages.text: Une arme remarquable, fabriquée il y a bien longtemps à la demande du tout premier libre-marchand de la maison Winterscale. Sa petite taille laissant à penser qu'elle avait été spécifiquement conçue pour une femme, de nombreuses légendes romantiques entourent aujourd'hui l'identité de la personne à qui elle était destinée.
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

traits.locale_text: Une arme remarquable, fabriquée il y a bien longtemps à la demande du tout premier libre-marchand de la maison Winterscale. Sa petite taille laissant à penser qu'elle avait été spécifiquement conçue pour une femme, de nombreuses légendes romantiques entourent aujourd'hui l'identité de la personne à qui elle était destinée.

languages.text: Eine hervorragende Waffe, die einst im Auftrag des ersten Freihändlers von Haus Winterzunder gefertigt wurde. Aufgrund des kleinen Griffs, der eindeutig für eine Frauenhand bestimmt ist, hat das Stück viele romantische Legenden über die mögliche Identität der Beschenkten hervorgebracht.
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.

traits.locale_text: Eine hervorragende Waffe, die einst im Auftrag des ersten Freihändlers von Haus Winterzunder gefertigt wurde. Aufgrund des kleinen Griffs, der eindeutig für eine Frauenhand bestimmt ist, hat das Stück viele romantische Legenden über die mögliche Identität der Beschenkten hervorgebracht.

languages.text: Winterscale Hanesi'nin ilk Hür Tacir'inin emriyle üretilen, muazzam bir silah. Bir kadın eli için tasarlandığı belli olan küçük kabzası nedeniyle, bu parça ve armağan edildiği kişinin muhtemel kimliği hakkında birçok romantik efsane doğmuştur.
languages.original_text: A magnificent weapon once crafted at the behest of the first Rogue Trader of House Winterscale. Due to the small handle clearly designed for a woman's hand, the piece has given rise to many romantic legends about the possible identity of the gift's recipient.
